  • Method Details

    • getProfile

      public FlipfitGymOwner getProfile(String email, String password)
      Retrieves the profile information of a gym owner based on the provided email and password. This method validates the credentials and returns the gym owner's profile details if the credentials match.
      Specified by:
      getProfile in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the gym owner whose profile is to be retrieved.
      password - The password of the gym owner to validate the credentials.
      Returns:
      A `FlipfitGymOwner` object containing the profile details of the gym owner if credentials are valid, or `null` if no matching record is found or if there is a SQL error.

    • addGym

      public boolean addGym(FlipfitGymCenter gym)
      Adds a new gym to the database with the provided details. The gym information includes name, address, location, owner ID, and status. If the gym is successfully added, the method proceeds to add the slots associated with the gym.
      Specified by:
      addGym in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gym - The `FlipfitGymCenter` object containing the gym's details to be added.
      Returns:
      `true` if the gym and its associated slots are successfully added to the database; `false` if the registration fails or an error occurs during the process.

    • addSlots

      public boolean addSlots(int gymId, List<Slot> slots)
      Adds a list of slots for a specific gym to the database. Each slot includes start time, seat count, and the gym ID. If any slot insertion fails, the method returns `false`. If all slots are successfully added, it returns `true`.
      Specified by:
      addSlots in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym to which the slots will be added.
      slots - A list of `Slot` objects representing the slots to be added.
      Returns:
      `true` if all slots are successfully added to the database; `false` if any slot insertion fails or an error occurs during the process.

    • createGymOwner

      public boolean createGymOwner(FlipfitGymOwner gymOwner)
      Registers a new gym owner in the system by adding their details to the database. The owner's information, such as name, email, password, contact details, and identification numbers, are inserted into the database with a default status of "unverified". If the registration fails for any reason, the method returns `false`. If the owner is successfully registered, it returns `true`.
      Specified by:
      createGymOwner in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - An instance of `FlipfitGymOwner` containing the owner's details to be registered.
      Returns:
      `true` if the gym owner was successfully registered; `false` if the registration failed.

    • updateGymOwner

      public boolean updateGymOwner(FlipfitGymOwner gymOwner)
      Updates the details of an existing gym owner in the database. This method allows updating the gym owner's name, phone number, and email. If the update is successful, it returns `true`. If no rows are updated or if the update fails, it returns `false`.
      Specified by:
      updateGymOwner in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - An instance of `FlipfitGymOwner` containing the updated details of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      `true` if the gym owner's details were successfully updated; `false` if the update failed.

    • validateGymOwner

      public boolean validateGymOwner(String email, String password)
      Validates the login credentials of a gym owner by checking the provided email and password against the database. If the email and password match an existing gym owner, the method returns `true`. Otherwise, it returns `false`.
      Specified by:
      validateGymOwner in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the gym owner.
      password - The password of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      `true` if the credentials are valid; `false` otherwise.

    • viewMyGyms

      public List<FlipfitGymCenter> viewMyGyms(int ownerId)
      Retrieves a list of gyms associated with a specific gym owner identified by the owner ID. The method queries the database for all gyms belonging to the owner and populates a list of `FlipfitGymCenter` objects. Additionally, it fetches the available slots for each gym.
      Specified by:
      viewMyGyms in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      A list of `FlipfitGymCenter` objects representing the gyms owned by the gym owner.

    • getSlotsByGymId

      public List<Slot> getSlotsByGymId(int gymId)
      Retrieves the list of available slots for a given gym based on the gym's ID. This method queries the database to fetch all slots (start time and seat count) associated with the specified gym.
      Specified by:
      getSlotsByGymId in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym.
      Returns:
      A list of `Slot` objects representing the available slots for the gym.

    • updateSeatCount

      public boolean updateSeatCount(int gymId, int startTime, int seatCount)
      Updates the seat count for a specific gym and slot based on the provided gym ID and start time. If the update is successful, the method returns `true`. If no rows are updated or an exception occurs, it returns `false`.
      Specified by:
      updateSeatCount in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym.
      startTime - The start time of the slot.
      seatCount - The new seat count to be updated.
      Returns:
      `true` if the seat count was updated successfully; `false` otherwise.

    • getSeatCount

      public int getSeatCount(int gymId, int startTime)
      Retrieves the current seat count for a specific gym and slot based on the provided gym ID and start time. If the seat count is found, it is returned. If an error occurs or no data is found, the method returns `-1`.
      Specified by:
      getSeatCount in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym.
      startTime - The start time of the slot.
      Returns:
      The seat count for the specified gym and slot, or `-1` if an error occurs or no data is found.

    • getGymOwnerIdByEmail

      public int getGymOwnerIdByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves the gym owner's ID based on their email address. The method queries the database and returns the owner ID if a matching record is found. If no matching record is found or an error occurs, it returns `-1`.
      Specified by:
      getGymOwnerIdByEmail in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      The owner ID associated with the provided email, or `-1` if not found or an error occurs.

    • updateGymDetails

      public boolean updateGymDetails(FlipfitGymCenter gym)
      Updates the details of a gym (location, address, name) based on the provided `FlipfitGymCenter` object. If the update is successful, the method returns `true`. If no rows are updated or an exception occurs, it returns `false`.
      Specified by:
      updateGymDetails in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gym - The `FlipfitGymCenter` object containing the updated gym details.
      Returns:
      `true` if the gym details were updated successfully; `false` otherwise.
